'''Sir Lenworth George Henry''', [[Order of the British Empire|CBE]], known as '''Lenny Henry''', is an English actor, comedian, singer, television presenter and writer. He has portrayed [[Sadoc Burrows]] in Amazon's ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' series.<ref>[https://www.theonering.net The OneRing.net] "[https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2021/10/12/111617-sir-lenny-henry-confirms-role-as-an-early-hobbit-in-amazons-lotr-show/ Sir Lenny Henry confirms role as an early Hobbit in Amazon's LOTR show]", 21 November 2021 (accessed 12 October 2021)</ref><ref>[https://www.thesun.co.uk The Sun], "[https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/13384086/lenny-henry-lord-of-the-rings-tv-quiz/ A NEW FELLOWSHIP Lenny Henry joins Lord of The Rings TV series along with famous faces from Quiz, Power and Arrow]", 21 November 2021 (accessed 4 December 2020)</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=31 July 2022}}</ref>
